title: YOU DESERVED YOUR BAN
body:
So Recently I played a game where the catlyin was basically walking away every time a team fight happened  leaving me to die to being cced for almost 5-8 seconds and velkoz legit decided to throw and even admitted it.  
Either way  I was toxic in this game I was majorly toxic in it. I have not been banned or chat restricted or anything.  This is one toxic game out of the hundreds that If I said something in chat it was something nice even if I was losing.  
If you were banned or chat restricted it was probably over MULTIPLE GAMES. I doubt that one game is what got you the ban. I have seen the action against box several times and sometimes  I see it after another game. it was probably after multiple instances of you being toxic  not just one.

There are those brave souls who just don't type no matter how tilted they are which is something I should pick up honestly. Yes I was toxic in this one game,however its one game outta many I slipped up and if they were to give me a chat restricion I would say yah no I deserved that. 
Im giving this example to show its not that one game that gets you banned its the many that you ruin simply by pressing enter every single game.

You still don't seem to understand so I will phrase it this way:

Someone tries to troll you on the Boards by trying to bait you into losing your cool and embarrassing yourself and you ignore his post. "Don't feed the trolls" worked because the troll wasted time writing their post and you lost nothing.

You are playing League and one of your teammates blames you for their death, says you don't deserve to win and starts inting. You ignore him, but he still causes you to lose the game. "Don't feed the trolls" didn't work because despite not interacting with the troll in any way the troll still got what he wanted (you to lose the game) and you lost both time and LP.

And just for the record, none of my posts here were meant to suggest a way to deal with trolls, I am simply pointing out why I don't think "Don't feed the trolls" works in League.
